title: Ranked doesnt give XP @Reds
body: Is there any reason for this? I mean, bugs? Or do we just not gain any experience playing ranked, cause that would suck all kinds of Duck

replies.body: Ranked games are definitely still giving experience as far as I can tell on my end. I can see a handful of games played tonight that has indeed given you exp, but I have actually seen a few reports that players haven't been able to see that exp. I would chalk this up to a visual bug for right now, and make sure you post this over in Report a Bug as well!
